title: The Surface Subgroup and the Ehrenpreis Conjectures
abstract:
We survey our recent results including the Surface
Subgroup Theorem and the Ehrenpreis Conjecture. Applications
and future direction are discussed.
note: JK is supported by NSF grant number DMS 0905812; VM is supported by NSF grant number DMS 1201463.
